statements: SELECT * FROM streetlight_sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE luminosity > 100
SELECT streetlight_id, location FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time FROM streetlight_sensors ORDER BY reading_time DESC
SELECT * FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'thermal'
SELECT * FROM streetlight_sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE luminosity > 50;
SELECT * FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE AND sensor_type = 'motion';
SELECT streetlight_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM streetlight_sensors GROUP BY streetlight_id;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM smart_streetlights;
SELECT location, sensor_value FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type='Motion';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM smart_streetlights ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage < 50;
SELECT id, location, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM smart_streetlights;
SELECT sensor_type, location, sensor_value FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type = 'motion';
SELECT * FROM smart_streetlights ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, sensor_value FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type = 'light';
SELECT id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM smart_streetlights WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Streetlights;
SELECT id, location FROM Streetlights WHERE light_level > 50;
SELECT light_id, power_consumption FROM Streetlights ORDER BY power_consumption DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM LightEvents WHERE event_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT light_id, SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_kwh_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY light_id HAVING total_kwh_consumed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Streetlights WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT light_id, location, light_level FROM Streetlights WHERE power_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY light_level DESC;
SELECT light_id, event_type, event_time FROM LightEvents WHERE event_type = 'Outage' AND event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT light_id, consumption_date, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_kwh > 50 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT light_id, event_description FROM LightEvents JOIN Streetlights ON LightEvents.light_id = Streetlights.light_id WHERE location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY event_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_streetlights;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM smart_streetlights ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT timestamp, sensor_type FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type = 'motion';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT streetlight_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM smart_streetlights;
SELECT location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM smart_streetlights ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, sensor_data FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type = 'motion' AND location = 'City Center';
SELECT id, sensor_data, timestamp FROM smart_streetlights WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, streetlight_id, energy_consumed, date FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM streetlights ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, wattage FROM streetlights WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, power_consumed FROM power_consumption ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_id, optimization_strategy FROM energy_optimization
SELECT * FROM streetlights WHERE wattage > 100 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, wattage FROM streetlights WHERE energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT s.sensor_type, p.power_consumed FROM sensors s JOIN power_consumption p ON s.id = p.sensor_id WHERE p.timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT e.optimization_strategy, e.last_optimization_date FROM energy_optimization e WHERE e.sensor_id = 2
SELECT m.* FROM maintenance m WHERE m.maintenance_date >= '2022-04-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date
